overview: Around 1820 the son of a California nobleman comes home from Spain to find his native land under a villainous dictatorship. On the one hand he plays the useless fop, while on the other he is the masked avenger Zorro.
tagline: Ride With Zorro . . . The Dashing Don Of California's Most Adventurous Era !
cast: Tyrone Power|Linda Darnell|Basil Rathbone|Gale Sondergaard|Eugene Pallette
